How to install:
1. Run Amazing Adventures 5 Riddle of The Two Knights_setup.exe

3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

A medieval chessboard has been unearthed, but all the pieces are missing! In Amazing Adventures: Riddle of The Two KnightsT you'll travel from the crowded bazaars of Morocco to the snow-swept mountains of Switzerland in search of these ancient artifacts. Explore 25 exotic locations as you track down over 2,000 cleverly hidden objects. Discover 50 hidden crowns in each scene to unlock two bonus game modes. Can you put the pieces together and solve the riddle? Join the expedition today in Amazing Adventures: Riddle of The Two KnightsT!
